holidays.title: Civic Holiday
holidays.description: Civic Holiday strives to help foster the spirit of community among residents.

holidays.title: Aged Care Employee Day
holidays.description: Aged care workers are there to assure that the lives of your elders are in safe hands.

holidays.title: Battle of Boyaca
holidays.description: Today, Colombians celebrate the decisive battle that freed them from the clutches of the Spanish.

holidays.title: British Columbia Day
holidays.description: All across Canada, the day is marked by parades, festivals, and other public gatherings.

holidays.title: Commerce Day
holidays.description: Commerce Day is a day to rest — leave work and relax on this public holiday.

holidays.title: Côte d'Ivoire Independence Day
holidays.description: Join Ivorians across the globe as they wish Côte d'Ivoire bonne fête de l'indépendance.

holidays.title: Festival Monday
holidays.description: Get your party hats and put on your dancing shoes; it’s Festival Monday!

holidays.title: Heritage Day in Alberta
holidays.description: Sunshine, fresh air, and open spaces, Alberta is a melting pot of different cultures and ethnicities.

holidays.title: Ivory Coast Independence Day
holidays.description: Ivory Coast Independence Day is an annual event that commemorates the Ivory Coast’s anniversary of independence.

holidays.title: Kadooment Day
holidays.description: Put on your finest clothes and get ready to party all day long.

holidays.title: Kiribati Youth Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Kiribati Youth Day with youth across the globe hoping for a brighter future.

holidays.title: Natal Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate, attend a lot of outdoor parties and eat a ton of cake.

holidays.title: National Lighthouse Day
holidays.description: We celebrate how these scenic, historic structures comforted travelers throughout the centuries.

holidays.title: National Raspberries n’ Cream Day
holidays.description: Get ready to eat as many raspberries as you can on this special day!

holidays.title: National Sea Serpent Day
holidays.description: Join the ancient quest for truth as we study the legend of the great sea serpents.

holidays.title: National Valentino Day
holidays.description: If you’re a Valentino, then today is your day to shine. Celebrate National Valentino Day today!

holidays.title: New Brunswick Day
holidays.description: It's not often that a birthday party is held for an entire province!

holidays.title: New South Wales Bank Holiday
holidays.description: Let's all celebrate three day weekends—the savior of nine-to-fivers around the world.

holidays.title: Northern Territory Picnic Day
holidays.description: Northern Territory Aussies have been celebrating Picnic Day since the late 1800s.

holidays.title: Particularly Preposterous Packaging Day
holidays.description: Let’s minimize unnecessary packaging and say no to plastic bags to reduce waste.

holidays.title: Professional Speakers Day
holidays.description: Get your mics ready to talk about all the great information we have about professional speakers.

holidays.title: Purple Heart Day
holidays.description: We remember and honor the men and women who bravely represented and sacrificed for their country.

holidays.title: Terry Fox Day
holidays.description: Honor a great man, a great foundation and a great cause by celebrating Terry Fox Day.

holidays.title: World Alternative Games
holidays.description: A day cannot get any more eccentric, thrilling, and fantastic than this.

holidays.title: Bruce Dickinson’s Birthday
holidays.description: The legacy of the Beast and other stories — find out more about the multi-faceted Bruce Dickinson.

holidays.title: Charlize Theron’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this influential South African actress, there are no limits. Celebrate her special day with us.

holidays.title: Dalton Gomez’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young successful luxury real estate agent has a lot to teach us.

holidays.title: David Duchovny’s Birthday
holidays.description: Actor, writer, producer, director, and novelist. Is there anything this man cannot do?

holidays.title: Jen Sincero’s Birthday
holidays.description: Going from broke to unbelievably wealthy, this self-improvement guru knows her stuff.

holidays.title: Luca Luhan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Uncover the story behind the young star’s rise to success right here with us.

holidays.title: NotYourAverageFlight’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is known for his prank and challenge videos, which he uploads on YouTube.
